titleStmt.title: Having seen a paper printed, reflecting on the person and labours of my dear husband Mr. William Strong; I was much amazed, especially it being supposed to have proceeded from men reputed godly: ...
titleStmt.author: Strong, Damaris.

notesStmt.note: A defense of the authenticity of the posthumous publications of William Strong, written by his widow, Damaris.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
